mapper.insert:
insert into car( car_id, car_license, car_brand, car_type, car_price, in_store, car_state, rental_price, car_picture, car_qualification, insurance_type, aduit_type, aduit_id )
values( #{carId}, #{carLicense}, #{carBrand}, #{carType}, #{carPrice}, #{inStore}, #{carState}, #{rentalPrice}, #{carPicture,typeHandler=com.xiyan.model.typeHandler.CarsPicUrlTypeHandler}, #{carQualifications,typeHandler=com.xiyan.model.typeHandler.CarQualTypeHandler}, #{insuranceType,typeHandler=com.xiyan.model.typeHandler.ArrayListTypeHandler}, #{aduitType}, #{aduitId} )
